job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pOlio Apps is looking for our next software engineer We are a small but talented group of full stack developers focused on meeting and exceeding our customersnbspexpectations when it comes to delivering their mission critical projects Those run the gamut of web apps native mobile apps web service backends and experimental prototypesppbrppIf you are a great communicator love honing your technical skills and enjoy building software that people will rely on in their daily lives  wed love to hear from youppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliAnalyze requirements and mockups to create actionable estimated ticket work itemsliliCreate technical designs encompassing the algorithms patterns and tools needed to accomplish the tasks at handliliBuild reusable components and aggregate those building blocks into featuresliliWrite unit tests and integration tests to ensure quality of workliliParticipate within a highly collaborative agile software development lifecycleliliCreate and receive high quality pull requests which enhances the overall quality of the engineering teamliulpnbspppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliBachelors degree in computer science or software engineering or equivalent experienceliliEffective and proactive communicator with a strong growth mindsetliliDemonstrated experience in React NativeliliHigh proficiency with Typescript and JavascriptliliProficiency in using modern web development technologies and techniques including AJAX HTML5 CSS Responsive Design web serviceslili3 years of experience in active software project developmentlili2 years working with React  React Nativelili2 years experience with Redux Redux Saga or equivalentsnbsplili1 years experience working with either Go Java Swift Objective C or Pythonlili1 years experience in building web services and API backendsliulpbrppstrongEmployment TypestrongpulliFull Timeliul
